connect20/facebook_pixel_retargeting.name: connect20/Facebook_Pixel_Retargeting

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/facebook_pixel_retargeting.description: The Facebook Pixel for Retargeting extension allows Facebook advertisers to build an audience from the users that visit their ecommerce store and retarget them using Facebook Ads.
